90% of daytraders lose money over the long run...

Don't let that be you.

You could go through the past 20 days, or 20 weeks and manually analyze your returns, but even 20 weeks can't capture the incredible variance that happens over months and years in the stock market.

The days of pure discretionary trading are dead. Trading is not a game. It is an art, that if performed well with proper risk management and statistical analysis, can build wealth - fast.

Do as hedgefunds do and ensure your statistical edge through backtesting.

How it works

We can turn any trading strategy into code for backtesting and live trading. Here's how it works:
 
Explain your strategy in words
Email, a text document, or over the phone. We're flexible!
We turn your strategy into a V1, testing algorithm
We will provide you the testable algorithm as well as our own backtest results
Test the validity of your strategy
Ensure your edge
If the results demonstrate viability, turn it into a live EA!

We will work closely with you to ensure a statistical edge in your strategy and build you a live EA that suits your risk tolerance and trading style with continued maintenance, upgrades and support for 6 months
We offer a testing period after V1 before you have to commit to the full V2 payment
